features: 👍BONDED LEATHER CHAIR, DESIGN FOR THE COMFORT--Not all artificial leather is created equally. This executive desk chair is upholstered in bonded leather that is resistant to scratches, stains, peeling, and cracking. With upholstered armrests and an elegant design look, this computer chair will complement your home or office perfectly.

👍SYNCHRO TILT&TENSION CONTROL--Simple pneumatic controls let you raise or lower your seat and rock back in your chair. Pull out the handle (right side of the chair) to tilt back, push in to stop tilting. Underneath tilt tension knob controls the tension of reclining, you can adjust it to your personal preferences.

👍FLIP-UP ARM DESIGN--Flip-up arms offer an arm-less option without detaching anything,which gives comfort and support for your arms and shoulders. 90°rotation design which allows the chair can fit under the desk for space saving.

👍WORKING FROM HOME--Perfect chair for working from home. This chair is super comfortable to sit on and high backrest provides customizable waist support that simply does wonders for long days of working. Wonderfully ergonomically high back design to provide the ideal neck and back support. Very, very soft, double padded seat feels super comfortable!

👍EASY TO ASSEMBLE--The office chair is easy to assemble, there’s a booklet for direction and all the screws are label, so you don't have to worry about how to assemble it. Just according the manual instruction, not difficult for anyone to put together!! If you have any further questions, pls feel free to contact us and we will reply you within 24 hours.

Backrest, headrest, seat cushion are all thick padded, softly wrap your body and provide strong support. WORKING FROM HOME--This office chair is cost-effective to relieve back pain caused by long-time working. Very, very soft, double padded seat feels super comfortable! Wonderfully ergonomic high back design provides the ideal neck and back support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Great Work from Home Chair High Back Leather Executive Office Chair ERGONOMIC DESIGN--With an ergonomic S-shape waterfall design, this high back office chair can perfectly fits your spine. Provide strong support while you working. THICK PADDED LEATHER--Premium leather made of this executive office chair. Backrest, headrest, seat cushion are all thick padded, softly wrap your body and provide strong support. WORKING FROM HOME--This office chair is cost-effective to relieve back pain caused by long-time working. Very, very soft, double padded seat feels super comfortable! Wonderfully ergonomic high back design provides the ideal neck and back support. Product Specifications: Total Height: 44.3" - 48" Back Height: 29.5" Seat Size: 21.1'' (W)* 19.7(D) Seat Height: 18.7" - 22.4" Seat Cushion Thickness: 3.9” Arm Length: 11.8" Load Capacity: 300lbs

THICK PADDED LEATHER & ROCK BACK THICK PADDED Ergonomic design with thick padded headrest and high backrest, extremely support and relax your body. High density elastic filling material is not easy to deform and sag that simply does wonders for long days of working. ROCK BACK & FORTH Thanks to the advanced tilt tension mechanism, this ergonomic reclining home office executive computer chair provides a reliable reclining rock function that helps relax your back muscles and increase blood circulation while working. SOFT CUSHION Feeling like sitting on the cloud. This office chair is especially suitable for people who work long hours a day. Very, very soft, double padded seat brings super comfortable! Waterfall edge which helps release pressure on the thigh.

SOLID CONSTRUCTION & SPACE-SAVING BIFIMA CERTIFIED This executive office chair is made to last! Advanced Class 3 gas lift allows the flexible and stable arrangement of height. Tested over 10,000 times and certified for safety and quality. FLIP-UP ARMS Soft-padded armrests for enhanced forearm comfort. 90° rotation design extremely practical for stowing under desk, improves flexibility for space-saving, and ideal for working from home. ROLLING CASTERS Nylon 360° rotating casters provide silent rolling for longer. Smooth enough to meet your any work movement. Also it will not scratch the floor.

ATTENTION! All office chairs come with a 1-year after-sales, and we are pleased to assist you. Just Let us Know! ✔️One Year After-sales ✔️Message replied within 24 hours ✔️Ship from the US local warehouse ✔️EASY TO ASSEMBLE

Thanks to the most advanced ergonomic design, this computer chair is actually very comfortable. Breathable leather, won't make you feel too warm after sitting for a long time. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price for a nice chair
reviews.reviewText: Good instructions and comfortable, real nice chair. We are really pleassd with the chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is truly the most comfortable place to sit in my house! And it rocks back and forth real easily so I just put a ottoman at the bottom of it and I can lean back far enough to sleep in it if I want and it is certainly comfortable enough to sleep in! LOL it rolls really well and doesn't leave marks on the floor and I just don't think you can go wrong buying this chair or your office or for any other use that you want it for

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars For the money it's a solid purchase, not fantastic but it works.
reviews.reviewText: So the chair was actually kind of difficult to put together when it came to getting the bolts into the back. It's definitely designed for 2 people to make it a bit easier, as I had to wrap my hand around both the back rest and the bottom to squeeze the two together to get the bolts in. Two bolts felt like they had stripped, but upon further twisting, they eventually locked into their final position (I'm guessing this is where some of the complaints about stripping come from, they just didn't twist far enough in...it's really surprising how deep the actual bolts go in, and how many turns it takes to finally settle them in).I will say the instructions were on a similar level to what La-Z-Boy provides, which is a nice touch. Easy to read, lots of solid details. They also came with a fair amount of extra parts, and the quality of the parts seemed decent. My only gripe is the plastic nubs to fit into the holes where the bolts go in, are not properly fitted, and most pop out on their own. It was very difficult to get them into place for the lower two sockets, and in attempting to force them into the upper holes where the moving armrest is ended up forcing me to use a small hammer, and I still couldn't get them to fit properly. Even swapping them out. I stopped trying as I ended up nicking the exterior slightly and did not feel like doing any extra exterior damage in a vain attempt. That said, they aren't really necessary. It looks fine with the holes around the movable armrest and the two bolts into the seat sealed off.The build quality is fairly decent. The exception seems to be the seat area. The sides and back of the seat have ample and adequate cushion and foam. However the center has almost nothing. I suppose this was a way to cut corners, and most large sized individuals tend to be thicker on the edges of their bums, rather than have more weight around the center, and most people will sit further back into the chair (were again, there is adequate cushioning). However once I move a little further into the center, as I tend to sit forward, that center cushion deflates really fast, and it's like sitting on a rock.The back support took some time to get used to. It's very thick foam in the lower back region, and it leans a bit backwards for what I'm used to (most of the chairs I buy are more straight backed). So it took a little time to get used to. It's not bad, but feels a bit off. I'm guessing this is designed to alleviate lower back pain, though it's a bit much, and pushes me forward, where when I lean forward into the seat, and given the angle of the seat's rear cushion, really pushes me into that center with limited cushioning. So I have to be very mindful of how I sit in this chair.I haven't had it long, so I'm not sure how well the foam will hold up. I had to replace a rather nice faux leather high back, but metal frame chair where the joint where the arm bolt is connected into the back is where some corners were cut (it's the width of the bolt itself, and of a lower grade material, not steel, so it broke with just a slight force application). This chair seems to be a bit more durable. However, it's plastic, with the only metal being the bolts and the screw holds meant to hold the thing together. So I'm not positive on longevity.The company that makes this chair is American, but its made in China. Though the quality is decent, and the thickness of the faux leather seems fairly solid, and difficult to rip or tear, though I'm not about to take a knife to it to properly test but some tugging and pulling indicates it will last awhile, even in dry weather.The rating itself is based on the price to quality. For what I paid, for what it is, it seems like a good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This chair was the easiest thing I have ever put together, and I did it alone, which is great since I had no one willing to help at the time!This chair is perfect for when I choose to game for a little bit of time, or a lot of time, for when I have a lot of typing to do, or even writing. The squishiness is just right, and I can lift the arms so they don't crash into my desk. I have accidentally spent close to seven hours in this chair and only struggled with my neck (because I do not look at my monitor properly, not because of this chair). Every time I use it, I am completely comfortable without feeling aches, stiffness, or numb butt/feet on the longer uses. Great buy! Worth the price, although I got it on sale at the time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good comfortable chair
reviews.reviewText: This chair is very comfortable. I like the appearance of it. I wanted a chair for my elderly mother to use at her computer desk that was easy to move or roll. This one does that. It was easily assembled for the most part. The only issue I had in putting it together was that it rolled too easily. I had to brace it against the box it came in while I was putting the arms on it. But that wasn't the chairs fault. The floor on which I was on while putting it together was a laminate floor that was very smooth which made the chair want to roll whenever I put the slightest pressure against it. Other than that it went together very smoothly. Very pleased with it so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: The instructions were easy to follow and the parts are high quality. The chair is very comfortable and complements my home office decor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Chair is good; quality control and customer service is NOT
reviews.reviewText: For $140 the chair is decent, but a bit expensive considering the cushion and padding feel soft and will wear out sooner than later Otherwise it feels good and provides support for extended periods of time (few hours of work)...CONS:the assembly was very easy, i think a total of 8-10 bolts... after assembling the chair, I sat on it, and I was leaning to the right... mind you, there is only one way and 4 bolts to attach the base to the mounting plate... so I reached out to customer service, who responded a couple of days later with a instructions on how to fix it... it appears this is a problem they have been facing and have diagrams and instructions on how the customer can fix it at home :) ... I asked for a replacement, they could not as the chair was out of stock... they offered to send me a new back, even though the base is the problem... they just dont really read or understand what the customer is saying. I asked for a discount, if I will be fixing the "new" chair I purchased... they said they cannot. So, quality control and customer service not so good...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable chair with easy assembly
reviews.reviewText: Just got the chair today and put it together in about 15 minutes. Was very easy to assemble and seems like high quality. It rolls around smoothly and no squeaks or noises. Very pleased. Hopefully it holds up!
